name: Beginner's Sword
description: A basic sword given to new adventurers. It's not much, but it's a start.
plaggComment: Great. A glorified butter knife. Can it even cut cheese? I doubt it.

name: Wooden Staff
description: A simple wooden staff imbued with basic magical properties.
plaggComment: It's just a stick. A fancy stick, but still a stick. I've seen better twigs.

name: Rusty Dagger
description: A worn dagger that has seen better days, but still sharp enough.
plaggComment: Perfect for cutting cheese! Oh wait, it's too rusty. Never mind, it's useless.

name: Iron Sword
description: A well-crafted iron sword with good balance and sharpness.
plaggComment: Now we're talking! Still not as sharp as my wit, but it'll do.

name: Mystic Wand
description: A crystalline wand that amplifies magical energies.
plaggComment: Ooh, sparkly! Almost as beautiful as a perfectly aged Camembert.

name: Twin Daggers
description: A pair of matching daggers designed for quick, precise strikes.
plaggComment: Two daggers! Perfect for double the cheese cutting. Wait, what are we fighting again?

name: Steel Greatsword
description: A massive two-handed sword that deals devastating damage.
plaggComment: Big, heavy, and completely impractical for cheese duties. But hey, intimidation factor!

name: Elemental Staff
description: A staff that can channel multiple elemental magics.
plaggComment: Fire, ice, lightning... but can it conjure cheese? That's the real question.

name: Shadow Blade
description: A dark blade that seems to absorb light itself.
plaggComment: Edgy. Very edgy. Like cheese that's been aged in darkness. Actually, that sounds delicious!

name: Dragon Slayer
description: A legendary sword forged specifically to slay dragons.
plaggComment: Dragons, huh? Do they like cheese? We should be friends, not enemies!

name: Archmage's Rod
description: The personal weapon of an ancient archmage, crackling with raw power.
plaggComment: Ancient magic, huh? I bet it predates even the oldest cheese. That's saying something!

name: Void Daggers
description: Twin daggers that seem to cut through reality itself.
plaggComment: Cutting through reality? Can they cut through to a dimension made entirely of cheese?

name: Excalibur
description: The legendary sword of kings, said to choose its own wielder.
plaggComment: A sword that chooses its wielder? I wonder if it would choose someone based on their cheese preferences.

name: Staff of Eternity
description: A staff that contains the power of time itself.
plaggComment: Time magic? Perfect! Can it age cheese instantly? That would be revolutionary!

name: Chaos Claws
description: Claws infused with pure chaotic energy, unpredictable and devastating.
plaggComment: Now THIS is my kind of weapon! Chaos and destruction... and probably great for shredding cheese!

name: Plagg's Cheese Knife
description: The ultimate cheese-cutting implement, blessed by Plagg himself.
plaggComment: NOW we're talking! The perfect weapon! Finally, someone gets it!

name: Infinity Blade
description: A blade that exists across all dimensions simultaneously.
plaggComment: Infinite dimensions... infinite cheese possibilities! This could be the key to the cheese multiverse!

name: Cosmic Scepter
description: A scepter containing the power of entire galaxies.
plaggComment: Cosmic power, huh? I bet there are entire planets made of cheese out there waiting to be discovered!

name: Cheese Grater Supreme
description: The ultimate cheese preparation tool, capable of grating anything into perfect cheese-like consistency.
plaggComment: PERFECTION! This is what peak weaponry looks like! Everything becomes cheese!
